fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
-Capital Requirements Directive (CRD) IV/Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) 
-Leverage Ratio Framework, Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR) 
-Framework for Bank Recovery and Resolution 
-Market Abuse Directive (MAD) Review 
-Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID) II/Regulation (MiFIR) 
-Framework for Corporate Governance 
-Regulation on OTC Derivatives, Central Counterparties and Trade Repositories (EMIR)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: Swedish municipalities and county councils in cooperation for beneficial financing of welfare.
